props.name: new PencilBrush
props.desc: PencilBrush class

props.name: color
props.desc: Color of a brush

props.name: decimate
props.desc: Discard points that are less than `decimate` pixel distant from each other

props.name: drawStraightLine
props.desc: Draws a straight line between last recorded point to current pointer Used for `shift` functionality

props.name: limitedToCanvasSize
props.desc: When `true`, the free drawing is limited to the whiteboard size. Default to false.

props.name: shadow
props.desc: Shadow object representing shadow of this shape.

props.name: straightLineKey
props.desc: The event modifier key that makes the brush draw a straight line. If `null` or 'none' or any other string that is not a modifier key the feature is disabled.

props.name: strokeDashArray
props.desc: Stroke Dash Array.

props.name: strokeLineCap
props.desc: Line endings style of a brush (one of "butt", "round", "square")

props.name: strokeLineJoin
props.desc: Corner style of a brush (one of "bevel", "round", "miter")

props.name: strokeMiterLimit
props.desc: Maximum miter length (used for strokeLineJoin = "miter") of a brush's

props.name: width
props.desc: Width of a brush, has to be a Number, no string literals

props.name: _drawSegment
props.desc: Invoked inside on mouse down and mouse move

props.name: _finalizeAndAddPath
props.desc: On mouseup after drawing the path on contextTop canvas we use the points captured to create an new fabric path object and add it to the fabric canvas.

props.name: convertPointsToSVGPath
props.desc: Converts points to SVG path

props.name: createPath
props.desc: Creates fabric.Path object to add on canvas

props.name: decimatePoints
props.desc: Decimate points array with the decimate value

props.name: initialize
props.desc: Constructor

props.name: onMouseDown
props.desc: Invoked on mouse down

props.name: onMouseMove
props.desc: Invoked on mouse move

props.name: onMouseUp
props.desc: Invoked on mouse up
